statements: SELECT * FROM fuel_maintenance_data WHERE vehicle_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT date, fuel_consumption FROM fuel_maintenance_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT AVG(fuel_consumption) AS avg_fuel_consumption FROM fuel_maintenance_data
SELECT * FROM fuel_maintenance_data WHERE fuel_consumption > 10 ORDER BY maintenance_cost ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM fuel_maintenance_data
SELECT * FROM fuel_maintenance_data ORDER BY date DESC, maintenance_cost ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_consumption FROM fuel_maintenance_data WHERE fuel_consumption > 10
SELECT AVG(fuel_consumption) AS avg_fuel_consumption FROM fuel_maintenance_data WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000
SELECT MAX(fuel_consumption) AS max_fuel_consumption, MIN(maintenance_cost) AS min_maintenance_cost FROM fuel_maintenance_data
SELECT vehicle_id, date, fuel_consumption * maintenance_cost AS total_cost FROM fuel_maintenance_data
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, date, fuel_amount FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, date, cost FROM fuel_consumption ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, date, fuel_amount, cost FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(fuel_amount) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, date, fuel_amount FROM fuel_consumption WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' AND fuel_amount > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, date, cost FROM fuel_consumption WHERE cost < 100 AND vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT vehicle_id, repair_cost, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_costs WHERE repair_cost > 500 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC, repair_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption JOIN maintenance_costs ON fuel_consumption.vehicle_id = maintenance_costs.vehicle_id WHERE fuel_amount > 100 AND repair_cost < 300;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(fuel_amount) AS total_fuel FROM fuel_consumption GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_fuel > 500;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_amount FROM FuelConsumption
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM MaintenanceCosts
SELECT consumption_date, fuel_type FROM FuelConsumption ORDER BY consumption_date DESC
SELECT maintenance_type, cost FROM MaintenanceCosts WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT year, planned_budget, actual_expenses FROM BudgetPlanning
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC, consumption_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_amount FROM FuelConsumption WHERE fuel_type = 'Gasoline' ORDER BY fuel_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceCosts WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND maintenance_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, cost FROM MaintenanceCosts WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%oil%' ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT year, planned_budget, actual_expenses FROM BudgetPlanning WHERE planned_budget >= actual_expenses ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data;
SELECT id, vehicle_id, date, fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data ORDER BY fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT description, total_cost FROM maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle_details WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT year, budget_amount, actual_expense FROM budget_planning WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_fuel_consumed > 100;
SELECT v.make, v.model, f.total_cost FROM vehicle_details v JOIN fuel_consumption_data f ON v.vehicle_id = f.vehicle_id WHERE f.total_cost > 50 ORDER BY f.total_cost DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT m.description, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM maintenance_records m GROUP BY m.description HAVING total_records > 1 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT b.year, b.budget_amount, b.actual_expense, (b.actual_expense - b.budget_amount) AS difference FROM budget_planning b WHERE b.actual_expense > b.budget_amount ORDER BY difference DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, date, liters_consumed FROM FuelConsumption ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM Vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT service_type, cost FROM MaintenanceCosts WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT year, total_budget FROM BudgetPlanning WHERE year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2022;
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(liters_consumed) AS total_liters_consumed FROM FuelConsumption GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT v.model, f.liters_consumed, v.year FROM Vehicles v JOIN FuelConsumption f ON v.vehicle_id = f.vehicle_id WHERE f.liters_consumed > 100;
SELECT s.service_type, m.date, m.cost FROM MaintenanceCosts m JOIN MaintenanceServices s ON m.service_type = s.service_type WHERE m.cost > 500 ORDER BY m.date ASC;
SELECT b.year, b.total_budget, (b.fuel_budget + b.maintenance_budget) AS total_expense FROM BudgetPlanning b WHERE b.total_budget > 50000;
